snippet: Top officials loyal to Gov. Chris Christie went to great lengths to make it appear that the closing of several toll lanes was part of a traffic study, according to documents released Friday.
abstract: Newly released documents reveal that closure of lanes leading to the George Washington Bridge was a purely political move, though officials loyal to New Jersey Gov Chris Christie went to elaborate lengths to make it seem like it was part of a traffic study; documents show a concerted effort by the officials to keep their true motivation hidden.

byline.original: By MARC SANTORA and KATE ZERNIKE

lead_paragraph: Top officials loyal to Gov. Chris Christie went to great lengths to make it appear that the closing of several toll lanes was part of a traffic study, according to documents released Friday.

headline.main: Bridge Scandal Papers Point to Cover-Up by Chris Christie Allies
headline.print_headline: Papers in Traffic Scandal Point To Cover-Up of Political Motives
